description: This file defines API routes for an admin panel in a FastAPI-based application, providing statistics such as sales by day, top books, and a summary of revenue and users. It includes authentication for admin users, database queries involving SQLAlchemy ORM models, and route handlers with relevant docstrings.

methods.name: _admin_required(authorization: Optional[str] = Header(None), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Checks for a valid bearer token in the request header and verifies that the user is a superuser. Raises HTTP exceptions if authentication fails or if the user is not an admin.

methods.name: sales_by_day(days: int = Query(7, ge=1, le=90), admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles the GET request to retrieve daily sales counts and revenue over a specified number of days.

methods.name: top_books(limit: int = Query(5, ge=1, le=50), admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Returns the top selling books by count, limited to a specified number.

methods.name: summary(admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Provides a summary of total revenue and user count.

ctags.signature: (days: int = Query(7, ge=1, le=90), admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
